resources.string:
"Read on to learn more about Avant-Garde Gallery Manager.
" "
" "This program is aimed at obfuscating your art collection from prying eyes.
" "Obfuscation is global. When turned on, every page is obfuscated. When turned off, 
" "every page is un-obfuscated.
" "Use the menu on any page to toggle obfuscation by selecting 'Flip View'.
" "You may also long-press on the page to trigger obfuscation. Your press must be stationary
" "for this feature. Long-press will not turn-off obfuscation.
" "
" "Comics
" "
" "This comic catalog was originally designed to work with a Firefox web extension, 
" "NHComicDownloader. This plugin assists with the download of comics from nHentai.net.
" "Use that tool to download comics, and then use this program to import them.
" "See the Import section of this guide for more information.
" "
" "Using the Comic Viewer
" "Tap the screen to show or hide the menu and navigation bars.
" "Long-press on the screen to obfuscate the image.
" "Select 'Flip View' from the menu to obfuscate or un-obfuscate the image.
" "Pinch to zoom.
" "Initial zoom-out will jump to the edges of the screen. Zoom again to zoom out beyond
" "the edges of the screen.
" "While zoomed, drag up, down, left, or right to pan the image.
" "Swipe left to go to the next page.
" "Swipe right to go to the previous page.
" "
" "Comic Import
" "The comic import was originally designed to work with the FireFox web extension
" "NHComicDownloader, designed in conjunction with this app. The app downloads a comic from
" "nHentai.net. It downloads the first page of a comic twice - the first page is renamed
" "to include nHentai comic ID and title. This is referred to as the comic cover page.
" "The second copy just includes the page number.
" "The user is to select the Import option from the menu. Then select the folder to import
" "from. The app will look through the folder for downloaded comic pages matching a naming
" "format. It will count the number of pages per comic, the number of comics, and the 
" "size of the import. It will verify that there is storage space on the external storage
" "to store the comic. It will then move those files to the application storage location
" "on external storage. Data about the comic is gathered and stored. The comic cover page
" "is deleted.
" "
" "Comic Export
" "Use the comic export feature to back-up your comics. The might choose to export to the
" "same storage device that is holding the comics, so make sure to move it off your device
" "by another mechanism.
" "The comic export feature creates a zip file containing the comic catalog contents.
" "[The import feature allows the user to import a zip file.] -feature in progress.
" "
" "Program Uninstall
" "The data is left on the External Storage after uninstall.
" "Typical location is /android/data/com.agcurations.aggallerymanager/data.
" "If you uninstall, you may obtain your data from this directory.
" "
" "
"
